entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
